Package Graph

Class ConnectedComponents

java.lang.Object
Graph.ConnectedComponents
public class ConnectedComponents extends Object
This class is used to find the connected components of a graph and find the chromatic number of the connected components. It takes in a graph object and returns the lower bound, chromatic number and upper bound of the graph.

    • search

      public int[] search(Graph graph)
      This method is used to find the connected components of a graph and find the chromatic number of the connected components. It takes in a graph object and returns the lower bound, chromatic number and upper bound of the graph.
      Parameters:
      graph - The graph object which needs to be analysed
      Returns:
      An array containing the lower bound, chromatic number and upper bound of the graph
